```{r}

ab <- nrow(archiu)
for (i in 1:ab) {
  if(archiu[i,3]=="R" | archiu[i,3]=="Rp"){
    archiu[i,] <- archiu[i, c(2,1,3,4)]
  }
  if(archiu[i,3]=="EJ"){
  
    archiu <- rbind.fill(archiu,archiu[i,])
  }
}
```
